attributes.action: MP's payments/second jobs outside parliament to be banned.
attributes.additional_details:
MP's should only be paid for work they were elected to do. Not second jobs. Not cash for access payments. Nothing. They are paid to represent constituents.
MP's know the payment details for the role and the expenses they can claim. Being an MP should not be a cash cow. Represent us, not line your own pockets.
I want the government to ban any second jobs and  payments for influence.
